xwikidoc.title: Calendar Translations
xwikidoc.content: xwiki.calendar.monthNames=['1월', '2월', '3월', '4월', '5월', '6월', '7월', '8월', '9월', '10월', '11월', '12월'] xwiki.calendar.monthNamesShort=['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec'] xwiki.calendar.dayNames=['일요일', '월요일', '화요일', '수요일', '목요일', '금요일', '토요일'] xwiki.calendar.dayNamesShort=['Sun', 'Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat'] xwiki.calendar.columnFormat.month=ddd xwiki.calendar.columnFormat.week=ddd M/D xwiki.calendar.columnFormat.day=dddd M/D xwiki.calendar.event.description=비고: xwiki.calendar.event.location=위치: xwiki.calendar.event.status=상태: xwiki.calendar.titleFormat.month=MMMM YYYY xwiki.calendar.titleFormat.week=MMM D YYYY xwiki.calendar.titleFormat.day=dddd, MMM D, YYYY xwiki.calendar.timeFormat=h(:mm)t xwiki.calendar.axisFormat=h(:mm)t xwiki.calendar.allDayText=종일 xwiki.calendar.button.today=오늘 xwiki.calendar.button.day=하루 xwiki.calendar.button.week=주 xwiki.calendar.button.month=월 xwiki.calendar.notification.inprogress=저장중... xwiki.calendar.notification.done=저장 완료 xwiki.calendar.notification.error=문서 저장에 실패했습니다. 이유: 업데이트 실패! xwiki.calendar.notification.loading=캘린더 로딩중... xwiki.calendar.notification.loaded=캘린더 로딩 완료 rendering.macro.calendar.name=캘린더 rendering.macro.calendar.description=캘린더 표시 rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gApiKey.name=gApi키 rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gApiKey.description=Google Calendar API 키. rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gCal.name=Google Calendar rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gCal.description=쉼표로 구분 된 Google Calendar ID들. rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.json.name=JSON ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.json.description=URL to a page generating JSON. This is only needed if the JSON generated by the Calendar.JSONService does not fit your needs. ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.updateurl.name=Update URL ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.updateurl.description=URL page to update events when they are moved or resized in the Calendar. The 'editable' parameter needs to be set to true for this field to be used. ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.classname.name=Classname ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.classname.description=Classname where the event objects are stored. The parameter is necessary unless a JSON service and and Update URL are provided ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.startfield.name=Start Field ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.startfield.description=Field in the object where the start date of the events are stored. The field needs to be a date field. The parameter is necessary unless a JSON service and and Update URL are provided ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.durationfield.name=Duration Field ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.durationfield.description=Field in the object where the duration of the events are stored. The field needs to be a date field. The parameter is necessary unless a JSON service and and Update URL are provided ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.editable.name=Editable ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.editable.description=Used to activate the edit feature allowing to move events ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.defaultView.name=Default View ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.defaultView.description=Default agenda to show on load of the agenda. Possible values are: month, agendaWeek, agendaDay, basicWeek, basicDay ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.year.name=Year ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.year.description=Year of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.month.name=Month ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.month.description=Month (from 0 to 11) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.date.name=Day ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.date.description=Day (from 1 to 31) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstDay.name=First Day ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstDay.description=First day (from 0 being Sunday to 6 being Monday) of the week to show in the calendar. Leave empty for Monday ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstHour.name=First Hour ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstHour.description=First hour to show in the calendar. Leave empty for default ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.minTime.name=Min Time ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.minTime.description=First time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours before this time. Leave empty for default (8.00) ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.maxTime.name=Max Time ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.maxTime.description=Last time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours after this time. Leave empty for default (23.00)
